overview: Curious George 30-Story Collection is your ticket to hours of family-friendly fun with 30 stories starring your favorite storybook character. The series on PBS KIDS follows George as he creates havoc at the zoo, visits a doctor's office, zooms into roller skate infamy and even flies a rocket. Kids will delight in every adventure while learning creative lessons in problem solving, science, mathematics and technology.
title: Curious George 30 Story Collection
